Description_lang: The mana cost of your Mind Blast is reduced by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: The mana cost of your Mind Blast is reduced by 10%.

description_blz.en_GB: The mana cost of your Mind Blast is reduced by 10%.

description_blz.zh_CN: 你的心灵震爆消耗的法力值降低10%。
